name: Class and Style: Grace Kelly and Audrey Hepburn Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Grace Kelly starred with Ray Milland and Bob Cummings in Hitchcock's very fine "Dial M for Murder". The actor who played the police investigator also starred in what other Hitchcock movie?
questions.explanation:
To Catch A Thief.

	John Williams was excellent as the police detective; he was also excellent as a nervous insurance man in "To Catch a Thief".

questions.text: Audrey Hepburn was delightful in "Charade" with Cary Grant. Everyone was looking for something of great value. What did it turn out to be?
questions.explanation:
A rare stamp.

	Charming Grant was supported by Walter Matthau, Jack Weston, James Coburn and George Kennedy. Entertaining movie.

questions.text: Kelly starred with Gary Cooper in the classic "High Noon". Her character's opposition to violence was based on what?
options: The death of her first husband through violence
questions.explanation:
Her Quaker religion.

	Kelly's character is a Quaker.

questions.text: Hepburn starred in the thriller "Wait Until Dark". Who played one of the "heavies"?
questions.explanation:
Richard Crenna.

	The late Richard Crenna had a fine movie career, but he may be best remembered for starring on TV in "The Real McCoys".

questions.text: Kelly also starred with Cary Grant in "To Catch A Thief". How does Grant first attract the attention of the insurance investigator?
questions.correct: He flips a coin in the air
options: He goes to a particular restaurant
questions.explanation:
He flips a coin in the air.

	The "signal" is for Grant to flip a coin in the air.

questions.text: Hepburn starred in "Breakfast at Tiffany's". Who was her leading man?
questions.explanation:
George Peppard.

	Ebsen was her ex-husband.

questions.text: Kelly starred in Hitchcock's "Rear Window" with James Stewart. Who played Stewart's police friend?
questions.explanation:
Wendell Corey.

	Good job by the always solid Corey. (Thelma Ritter, too.)

questions.text: Hepburn starred in "Robin and Marian". Who played Robin?
questions.explanation:
Sean Connery.

	Robin Hood and Marian - years later.

questions.text: Kelly played a less-than-glamorous role in "The Country Girl" with William Holden and Bing Crosby. Who wrote the play?
questions.explanation:
Clifford Odets.

	Good dramatic performances by all three leads. Odets also did "Golden Boy".

questions.text: Hepburn starred in Lillian Hellman's "The Children's Hour"  with James Garner and Shirley Maclaine. The destructive rumor that affected all three had to do with ...?
questions.explanation:
Sex.

	Gossip about the relationship between the two female characters leads to tragedy.
